author: bridge-bot
content: <james_parillo> Much of this discussion is just making these points

author: bridge-bot
content: <SamWilsn> What's the size limit of a single blob? (re @ethrnd_rollcall_bot: <ajsutton> [reply]: It's way more efficient to submit as much data in a single tx as possible, so 6 blobs is the cheapest option if it gets included on chain reliably/fast enough.  If nothing else, for each transaction you pay 21k gas which is amortised over the number of blobs in each tx.)

author: bridge-bot
content: <Highlander1969> 128kb (re @SamWilsn: What's the size limit of a single blob?)
